p: MDCK cells on treated coverslips were inoculated with B/Guangzhou/0215/2012 (1 MOI) at 4°C for 2 h; then, the supernatant was removed, and the cells were washed twice with cold PBS. Next, 0.6 mg/mL LQ or the same concentration of DMSO was added to cells at 0 h after infection. The supernatant was removed at 8 h after infection, and the coverslips were prepared for use in the immunofluorescence assay by washing twice.
